page.title: 14BAIRDSWEAR LIMITED
page.content: Bairdswear Ltd is one of ten factories in the U.K.They are part of Baird Textile Holdings. Bairdswear is situated on Inchinnan Industrial Estate.It has been opened for 8 years and employs approximately 300 people(mostly women). Bairdswear is a clothing manufacturer making ladies'and children's blouses.These blouses go out to large shops such as Marks & Spencers,Mothercare,British Home Stores and Littlewoods.The biggest majority of the clothes go to Marks & Spencers because they are the biggest buyers. The blouses arrive at Bairdswear all cut just ready to get sewn and distributed to the shops. Bairdswear have computerised wages and work study.
